attributes.action: pass laws that obliges ALL Businesses to turn off their Office Lights at night as their workers leaves their Offices and only switch them on again in the morning.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Light Pollution is a national disgrace that is wasting millions of Pounds Sterling monthly by Companies and Businesses for not good or practical reason other than to create yet more waste, pollution and hardship. One must lead from the front and therefore any Company or Business who leaves their lights on at night should be fined 1% (one percent) of their profits each day that they disobey the Law and/or create yet more Light Pollution.
